Suche¶

Suchanfragen werden mit Elasticsearch umgesetzt.

Datenbasis¶

Die Datenbasis besteht aus drei verschiedenen Datentypen:

  • Publications
[
  {
    "ENTRYTYPE": "book",
    "author": "Max Mustermann",
    "title": "Sch\u00f6nes Buch",
    "ID": "pub1",
    "namespace": "soep-core",
    "year": 2014
  },
  {
    "ENTRYTYPE": "book",
    "author": "Max Mustermann",
    "title": "Ein anderes Buch",
    "ID": "pub2",
    "namespace": "soep-core",
    "year": 2015
  }
]
  • Questions
[
  {
    "study": "soep-core",
    "question": "q1",
    "analysis_unit": "p",
    "items": [
      {
        "text": "Wie Zufrieden bist Du mit den folgenden Bereichen Deines Lebens?",
        "scale": "txt",
        "item": "root"
      },
      {
        "text": "Familie",
        "scale": "cat",
        "item": "family"
      },
      {
        "text": "Arbeit",
        "scale": "cat",
        "item": "work"
      }
    ],
    "namespace": "soep-core",
    "period": "wave1",
    "questionnaire": "soep-core-2011-pe"
  },
  {
    "study": "soep-core",
    "question": "q2",
    "analysis_unit": "p",
    "items": [
      {
        "text": "Wie alt bist Du?",
        "scale": "num",
        "item": "root"
      }
    ],
    "namespace": "soep-core",
    "period": "wave1",
    "questionnaire": "soep-core-2011-pe"
  }
]
  • Variables
[
  {
    "variable": "var1",
    "dataset": "dataset1",
    "namespace": "soep-core",
    "study": "soep-core",
    "conceptual_dataset": "org",
    "analysis_unit": "p",
    "label": "First variable label",
    "period": "wave1"
  },
  {
    "variable": "var2",
    "dataset": "dataset1",
    "namespace": "soep-core",
    "study": "soep-core",
    "conceptual_dataset": "org",
    "analysis_unit": "p",
    "label": "Second variable label",
    "period": "wave1"
  }
]

Suchanfragen¶

Suchanfragen werden über eine Elasticsearch-Schnittstelle gesendet. Siehe Components
